atk-s0401a11:1: 140. Ekādasame vagge adhammaṁ adhammotiādīni vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0401a11:4_0: 150. Dvādasame pana anāpattiṁ āpattītiādīsu ‘‘anāpatti ajānantassa atheyyacittassa
atk-s0401a11:4_1: namaraṇādhippāyassa anullapanādhippāyassa namocanādhippāyassā’’ti tattha tattha vuttā
atk-s0401a11:4_2: anāpatti anāpatti nāma, ‘‘jānantassa theyyacittassā’’tiādinā nayena vuttā āpatti
atk-s0401a11:4_3: āpatti nāma, pañcāpattikkhandhā lahukāpatti nāma, dve āpattikkhandhā garukāpatti
atk-s0401a11:4_4: nāma. Dve āpattikkhandhā duṭṭhullāpatti nāma, pañcāpattikkhandhā aduṭṭhullāpatti
atk-s0401a11:4_5: nāma. Cha āpattikkhandhā sāvasesāpatti nāma, eko pārājikāpattikkhandho anavasesāpatti
atk-s0401a11:4_6: nāma. Sappaṭikammāpatti nāma sāvasesāpattiyeva, appaṭikammāpatti nāma anavasesāpattiyeva.
